ResponseRule.name: January: ClickMe Comments, Fallback
ResponseRule.description: A fallback acknowledgement if January is out of things to say.

ResponseRule.name: January: ClickMe Comments, After Video
ResponseRule.description: Follow-up story comments after the station has been rebooted and the player revisits the office.

ResponseRule.name: January: ClickMe Comments, After Reboot
ResponseRule.description: Follow-up story comments after the player has seen the video.

ResponseRule.name: January: ClickMe Comments, After Dahl Arrived
ResponseRule.description: Follow-up story comments after the Apex has Arrived

ResponseRule.name: January: ClickMe Comments, After Apex
ResponseRule.description: Follow-up story comments after the Apex has Arrived

ResponseRule.name: Player Attacked January
ResponseRule.description: Player did damage to January.

ResponseRule.name: January: Office Greeting -- 1st Neuromod
ResponseRule.description: January meets Morgin in person, in Morgan's office, for the first time. Gives 1st Neurmods.

ResponseRule.name: January: HW Lab KeyCard Reminder
ResponseRule.description: January reminds player to come grab the keycard to the HW Lab

ResponseRule.name: Come Closer
ResponseRule.description: January showed up but the player is standing far away.

ResponseRule.description: January meets Morgin in person, in Morgan's office, for the first time.

ResponseRule.name: January: Gives Psychotronics Lab Key
ResponseRule.description: January meets Morgin in person, in Morgan's office, for the first time. Gives Morgan the key to the Hardware Labs

ResponseRule.name: Morgan Office: Plyr Already Knows About Lift
ResponseRule.description: January is briefing Morgan about heading up to Deep Storage and the player already knows the elvator is locked down.
